name: FlashLightforEchoShow&Spot
0:
”Alexa open flash light”
”Alexa start flash light”
”Alexa launch flash light”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flash light
des:
The first ever flashlight skill for your Echo Show and Spot!

A simple voice command turns your device into a powerful flashlight. Simply say "Alexa, open flash light" and Alexa will turn the screen to a very bright white for as long as you want. When you're ready to turn it off, just say "Alexa, turn off screen."

IMPORTANT: For best results, turn off "Adaptive Brightness" on your device. Do this by swiping down from the top of it's screen, selecting the gear icon, scroll down to "Display," and toggle off "Adaptive Brightness." Then adjust the brightness to maximum on the same screen.

Please leave a review if you like the skill so we can keep adding features! Logo designed by Pixel perfect from Flaticon. Copyright Zach Nagengast.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
